name: Panela Limeade
description: A full-bodied, caramely limeade sweetened with panela.
recipeIngredient: 4 thin strips lime zest, plus more for garnish if desired
1/4 cup lime juice, from 3 to 4 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lime zest, panela and 1 cup of water in a small saucepan over medium heat. Stir frequently using a wooden spoon to break up any stubborn pieces of panela until the panela is completely dissolved. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature.
Once cool, remove the lime zest. Pour into a quart jar or large measuring cup and add the lime juice and enough water to equal 4 cups total liquid, about 2 1/2 cups.
Refrigerate until completely cool and serve in ice-filled glasses, garnished with lime zest if desired.
